roleset.name: type of spatial configuation, non-agentive swinging
roleset.note: SWING-V NOTES: Frames file for 'swing' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. Usually takes adverbial of manner. Corresponds to VN class entity_specific_modes_being-47.2. (from swing.01-v)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: They do n't like the risks they are forced to assume when prices swing so drastically .

roleset.name: cause swinging motion
roleset.note: SWING-V NOTES: This could perhaps be merged with swing.01. Corresponds to VN classes roll-51.3.1, coil-9.6-1, spatial_configuration-47.6. (from swing.02-v)
SWING-N NOTES: Updated by Julia based on swing-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls roll-51.3.1, spatial_configuration-47.6. (from swing.01-n)

example.name: PRP
example.text: he prepares for some practice swings

example.name: TMP
example.text: Skilled ringers use their wrists to advance or retard the next swing

example.name: both args
example.text: my sense is that Woods has lost confidence in his swing of the longer clubs

roleset.name: quantifiable motion
roleset.note: SWING-N NOTES: Corresponds to VNcls calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from swing.02-n)

roles.note: arg2-EXT (in the verbal frame) has been replaced here by arg2-attribute because of its recurrence in the corpus examples. If EXT comes up, use the argM tag. (from swing.02-n)

example.name: stock report, natch
example.text: J.P. Morgan& Co. swung to a loss in the third quarter, while NCNB Corp. reported net income more than doubled, and Security Pacific Corp. net rose 10%.
example.arg: while NCNB Corp. reported net income more than doubled, and Security Pacific Corp. net rose 10%

example.name: args 1 and 4
example.text: a swing of the pendulum back to the gas side

example.name: with attribute
example.text: investors would simply have to get used to the market 's big price swings .

example.name: swing me baby, one more time
example.text: Aided by the fluid playing of the St. Louis Symphony under Leonard Slatkin's direction, this ``Serenade'' really swings.
example.arg: Aided by the fluid playing of the St. Louis Symphony under Leonard Slatkin's direction

example.name: response
example.text: When asked if raising profits by 20% was possible, the accountantsreplied,"We can swing that."
